#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int main() {
    int n, m, x;
    scanf("%d %d %d", &n, &m, &x);
    
    // Read the c array
    int c[n][m+1];
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < m+1; j++) {
            scanf("%d", &c[i][j]);
        }
    }
    
    // Process File 1
    int res1 = -1;
    int total_masks = 1 << n;
    int *valid = (int*)malloc(total_masks * sizeof(int));
    if (!valid) {
        printf("-1\n");
        return 0;
    }
    for (int mask = 0; mask < total_masks; mask++) {
        valid[mask] = 0;
    }
    for (int mask = 1; mask < total_masks; mask++) {
        valid[mask] = 1;
    }
    
    int proceed = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= m && proceed; i++) {
        int *new_valid = (int*)malloc(total_masks * sizeof(int));
        if (!new_valid) {
            proceed = 0;
            res1 = -1;
            break;
        }
        for (int mask = 0; mask < total_masks; mask++) {
            new_valid[mask] = 0;
        }
        for (int mask = 0; mask < total_masks; mask++) {
            if (valid[mask]) {
                int sum = 0;
                for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
                    if (mask & (1 << j)) {
                        sum += c[j][i];
                    }
                }
                if (sum >= x) {
                    new_valid[mask] = 1;
                }
            }
        }
        // Check if any valid subsets remain
        int has_any = 0;
        for (int mask = 0; mask < total_masks; mask++) {
            if (new_valid[mask]) {
                has_any = 1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (!has_any) {
            proceed = 0;
            res1 = -1;
        } else {
            free(valid);
            valid = new_valid;
        }
    }
    
    if (proceed) {
        res1 = -1;
        for (int mask = 0; mask < total_masks; mask++) {
            if (valid[mask]) {
                int cost = 0;
                for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
                    if (mask & (1 << j)) {
                        cost += c[j][0];
                    }
                }
                if (res1 == -1 || cost < res1) {
                    res1 = cost;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    free(valid);
    
    // Proceed to File 2
    int N = res1;
    int ans2 = 0;
    int current = 10;
    int prev = 1;
    while (current <= N) {
        ans2 += current - prev;
        prev = current;
        current *= 100;
    }
    int remaining = N - prev + 1;
    if (remaining > 0) {
        ans2 += remaining;
    }
    int res2 = ans2;
    
    // Proceed to File 3
    int n3 = res2;
    int l = 1, r = n3;
    while (l < r) {
        int mid = l + (r - l) / 2;
        int idxcnt = mid * (mid + 1) / 2;
        if (idxcnt < n3) {
            l = mid + 1;
        } else {
            r = mid;
        }
    }
    l -= 1;
    int idxcnt = l * (l + 1) / 2;
    int res3 = n3 - idxcnt;
    
    printf("%d\n", res3);
    
    return 0;
}
